title: Buttons are back at Porsche as we see the 2024 Cayenne interior
description: After the all-touchscreen Taycan, it's a welcome change.

title: NASA delays flight of Boeing’s Starliner again, this time for parachutes
description: "It's just a matter of going through all that data."

title: Lenovo gives up on its dream of Android gaming phones
description: Phones brought special gaming-centric Android hardware, but nobody made games for it.

title: After two years, Autodesk Maya and AutoCAD become Apple Silicon-native
description: Autodesk has never said why this took so long compared to competitors.

title: Fearing “loss of control,” AI critics call for 6-month pause in AI development
description: "This pause should be public and verifiable, and include all key actors."

title: Judge finds Google destroyed evidence and repeatedly gave false info to court
description: Google in trouble for auto-deleting chats needed as evidence in Epic Games case.

title: Apple’s WWDC 2023 keynote will take place on June 5
description: In addition to iOS 17 and macOS 14, Apple could announce its XR platform.

title: Reddit cracked down on revenge porn, creepshots with twofold spike in permabans
description: Reddit also launched a transparency center to help users assess platform safety.

title: Google and ADT have a new security system with lots of subscription fees
description: In 2020, Google bought 6% of ADT and promised this "next gen" security system.

title: Elemental music: Interactive periodic table turns He, Fe, Ca into Do, Re, Mi
description: Hydrogen has a scale pattern; zinc "sounds like an angelic vocalist singing with vibrato."

title: Twitter obtains subpoena forcing GitHub to unmask source-code leaker
description: GitHub has until April 3 to provide details on user "FreeSpeechEnthusiast."

title: The Last of Us’ first PC port is riddled with apparent performance issues
description: Naughty Dog "actively investigating" load time, crashing, and stuttering problems.

title: Steam will end support for Windows 7 and 8 in January of 2024
description: Windows 7 still runs on more Steam PCs than every version of Linux combined.

title: California wants to build more solar farms but needs more power lines
description: Transmission is now a big tension point for clean energy developers across the US.

title: With Amazon Alexa’s future in peril, Fire TVs offer a glimmer of hope
description: Fire TV devices encourage the kind of Alexa interactions that actually make money.

title: Ransomware crooks are exploiting IBM file exchange bug with a 9.8 severity
description: If you haven't patched your Aspera Faspex server, now would be an excellent time.
